name: My Home Projects
tagline: A random assortment of side projects I have decided to create in my spare time!
body:
***
### About myself
It has been more than 2 years now since I have graduated college, and I have worked as a middle-end developer using proprietary software ever since. But recently, I have realized that I am way out of touch with many new technologies & languages, so I decided to start seriously learning and working on projects outside of work.

## My Current Progress
### 1. Creating the main page
This is my first time creating a webpage, so I am still trying to grasp the basics. I am currently learning the basics of CSS and working on getting my main page of GitHub Pages looking good. For anyone else that may be interested, some resources that I am using as guides include:
* [How I built my blog in one day](http://erjjones.github.io/blog/How-I-built-my-blog-in-one-day/)
* [Webdev Resources (Reddit post)](https://www.reddit.com/r/webdev/comments/1v7en8/webdev_resources/)  
  
(Yes, as much as it pains me, I do often spend too much time browsing Reddit)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
